Name: Caveman Hunt
About the game: Caveman hunt - hunt dinosaurs of the ancient world in this platformer with shooter elements. Shoot dinosaurs from primitive times to get as much meat as possible for your tribe. Jump accurately across platforms and hit targets to achieve success Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack
